price: ߞߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߞߋ߬ߟߋ߲߬ߠߊ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߘߴߊ߬ ߓߟߏߟߊߓߐ߫
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
